sentences.en: ...Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone.
sentences.cn: …亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔，电话的发明者。

sentences.en: Alexander Graham Bell was the inventor of the telephone.
sentences.cn: 亚·格·贝尔是电话的发明人.

sentences.en: Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone
sentences.cn: 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔，电话的发明者

sentences.en: Edison won his spurs as an inventor while rather young.
sentences.cn: 爱迪生很年轻的时候就获得了发明家的声誉.

sentences.en: French artist and inventor of the daguerreotype process for obtaining positive photographic prints.
sentences.cn: 达盖尔,路易斯·雅克·曼德1789-1851法国艺术家和发明家,发明了银版摄影术,能洗出照片的正画来.

sentences.en: He became famous as an inventor of astonishing visual and aural effects.
sentences.cn: 他因发明了神奇的视听效果而出名。

sentences.en: Her son was filled with ambition to become a great inventor.
sentences.cn: 她儿子一心想成为伟大的发明家.

sentences.en: People laughed at the inventor's extravagant praise of his invention.
sentences.cn: 人们讥笑那发明家对他的发明的过度夸耀.

sentences.en: Right. He was an inventor at your age, you know.
sentences.cn: “正确. 你知道他和你一样大时,就是发明家了. ”

sentences.en: The inventor contrived a new kind of engine with fewer moving parts.
sentences.cn: 这位发明家发明了一种具有较少运动部件的新型发动机.

sentences.en: The inventor had an original mind.
sentences.cn: 那个发明家具有创新的头脑.

sentences.en: The inventor is trying to market his new product.
sentences.cn: 发明者正想推销他的新产品.

sentences.en: The inventor of the daguerreotype is a French artist.
sentences.cn: 银版照相的发明者是位法国艺术家。

sentences.en: The inventor went broke because nobody would buy his machine.
sentences.cn: 这位发明家破产了因为没人要买他的机器.

sentences.en: The machine is named after its inventor.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是以其发明者的名字命名的.

sentences.en: The Nobel Medal bears the image of the great Swedish inventor.
sentences.cn: 诺贝尔奖章上有这位瑞典的伟大发明家的像.

sentences.en: The royalties enabled the inventor to re-establish himself in business.
sentences.cn: 专利使用费让这位发明家得以再次立足于商界。

words.tran_cn: 发明的；有发明才能的；独出心裁的
发明；发明物；虚构；发明才能
发明人,作者,发现者,创建者

trans.tran_en: someone who has invented something, or whose job is to invent things
